title: found a typo that nearly cost me 1845 ip
body: on the linked reddit thread i show the math for this typo/bug which lead people to believe buying one thing over another is better when that is not true, read the reddit discussion for details.

replies.body:
Hello,

I think the seals are better than glyphs. With glyphs, if you divide 1.17 by 18 levels it will be 0.065, but if you divide 1.20 by 18 levels it will be 0.066666666..., which is repeating decimal 0.0(6), which was, probably, displayed as 0.06 without brackets.
It would be more accurate, if they change it's display to at least 0.066.

I hope this helps, good luck!
